DashboardHome.refreshMessage: Uh oh, looks like this page is unplugged. Refresh to stay plugged in!
DashboardHome.tutorialSingleAcctTitle: Welcome to your new Home view!
DashboardHome.tutorialNoAcctDesc: Add an electricity account to myTNB and you'll have access to your usage and all services offered.
DashboardHome.tutorialSingleAcctDesc: This is a summary of your linked electricity account. Tap on the account to view your Usage. Tap “Add” to link another account to myTNB.
DashboardHome.tutorialThreeAcctsDesc: View a summary of all your linked electricity accounts here. Tap on your preferred account to view your Usage. Tap “Add” to link another account to myTNB.
DashboardHome.tutorialMoreAcctsDesc: View a summary of all your linked electricity accounts here. Tap on your preferred account to view your Usage.
DashboardHome.tutorialQuickAccessDesc: Tap “Add” to link an account to myTNB. Use “Search” to look for a specific one! Just type in the nickname or account number.
DashboardHome.tutorialQuickActionDesc: Get all of the services myTNB has to offer. New features are highlighted so you don’t miss out on anything!
DashboardHome.tutorialNeedHelpDesc: We’ve highlighted some of the most commonly asked questions for you to browse through.
DashboardHome.serviceRefreshMessage: Uh oh, looks like your quick actions have been unplugged. Refresh to stay plugged in!
DashboardHome.titleIcUpdate: Complete your myTNB profile now for a better myTNB experience!
DashboardHome.bodyIcUpdate: Your identification number is not captured in your myTNB profile, update it now to have better access and controls over your electricity accounts!

SSMROnboarding.onboardingTitle2: Why should I enable this service?
SSMROnboarding.onboardingDescription1: Self Meter Reading is a service you can enable to easily read and submit your own meter readings. We will send you a reminder when it's time to submit.
SSMROnboarding.onboardingDescription2: You get estimated bills when TNB meter readers can’t get access to your meter. With this service, you will always get bills with accurate readings.

SSMRApplication.title: Self Meter Reading
SSMRApplication.terminateTitle: We’re sorry to see you go! Can you tell us why you want to stop this service?
SSMRApplication.tncUnsubscribe:
Note: Reapplication for Self Meter Reading service is currently unavailable.

By submitting, you are agreeing to the TNB’s Terms of Use, Privacy policy, Anti-Spam Policy and Personal Data Protection Policy.
SSMRApplication.tncSubscribe: By submitting, you are agreeing to the Self Meter Reading Terms and Conditions, TNB’s Terms of Use, Privacy policy, Anti-Spam Policy and Personal Data Protection Policy.
SSMRApplication.editContactInfo: By editing, you will update your myTNB profile and electricity account contact details.
SSMRApplication.tncSubscribeFAQ: By submitting, you are agreeing to the Self Meter Reading FAQ,
SSMRApplication.tncSubscribeTNC: TNB’s Terms of Use, Privacy policy, Anti-Spam Policy and Personal Data Protection Policy.

SSMRReadingHistory.title: Self Meter Reading
SSMRReadingHistory.subTitle: I want to read my own meter for:
SSMRReadingHistory.enableSSMRDescription: Sorry, Self Meter Reading service for this account is currently unavailable at the moment.
SSMRReadingHistory.noEligibleAccount: Looks like your accounts aren’t eligible to start Self Meter Reading service
SSMRReadingHistory.noHistoryData: Looks like you have no meter reading history at the moment.
SSMRReadingHistory.tutorialHeaderTitle: Your reading status at a glance.
SSMRReadingHistory.tutorialHeaderDesc: Switch between your accounts and get an overview of your meter reading status here.
SSMRReadingHistory.whereIsMyMeter: Where can I look for my meter?
SSMRReadingHistory.whereIsMyMeterTitle: Where can I look for my meter?
SSMRReadingHistory.whereIsMyMeterMessage: To submit your monthly meter reading, you must be able to view the reading stated in your meter display screen. Your meter usually located near your door, or your building meter room (riser).
SSMRReadingHistory.doYouHaveMeterAccess: Do you have access to your meter?

SMREligibiltyPopUpDetails.Title: Why are some of my accounts not here?
SMREligibiltyPopUpDetails.Description: We took the liberty to only show you electricity accounts that are eligble for the Self Meter Reading service. Click here to learn more about its eligibility.

SSMRSubmitMeterReading.title: Submit Meter Reading
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipTitle1: Alright, what do I need to read?
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipTitle2: But wait, how do I read my meter?
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipTitle3: How do I enter these values?
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipDescription1: You'll need to read 3 reading values (kWh, kVARh, kW). Your meter will automatically flash one after the other.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipDescription2: You can enter each reading manually or just take/upload a photo, and we’ll do the reading for you.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipDescription3: Enter the numbers according to its unit in the input. You'll see your previous month's reading as a reference.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipDescription4: Your meter will display the kWh reading by default. Enter the reading manually or just take/upload a photo, and we’ll do the reading for you.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tooltipDescription5: For manual reading, enter the kWh numbers in the input. You’ll see your previous month's reading as a reference.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.headerDescription: Take or upload photos, or manually enter your meter reading for each respective unit.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.singleHeaderDescription: Take or upload a photo, or manually enter your meter reading here.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.note: Note: Please round up the numbers if the reading values are showing decimal points on your meter.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.manualInputTitle: Please enter your meter reading for the unit(s) below.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.ocrDownMessage: Photo submission is currently unavailable. Please enter your reading manually below.
SSMRSubmitMeterReading.tutorialReadMeterDesc: Enter according to its unit(s). You’ll see your previous month's reading as a reference.

SSMRCaptureMeter.ocrReading: Please wait for a moment while we read your photos...
SSMRCaptureMeter.singleTakePhotoDescription: Take a photo of the reading value you see on your meter.
SSMRCaptureMeter.editDescription: You can select a photo to delete and retake or adjust it before submission.
SSMRCaptureMeter.multiTakePhotoDescription: There will be {0} different units. Take a photo of the 1st unit you see.
SSMRCaptureMeter.multiTakeNextPhotoDescription: Great! Now take a photo of the next unit you see.
SSMRCaptureMeter.singularOnto: On to the final unit {0} now.
SSMRCaptureMeter.pluralOnto: On to the next units {0} and {1}.

SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Title: Uploading from your album?
SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Description: Be sure to upload a straight-facing photo containing the value. You don’t need a photo of the whole meter. Ensure the numbers are clear and there is no glare, shadow or distortion.

SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Title: How do I take these photos?
SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Description:
You'll need to submit {0} different meter reading values ({1}).

Stand close to your meter. You don’t need a photo of the whole meter. Just capture the box containing the values with your camera directly facing it. Ensure the numbers are clear and there is no glare, shadow or distortion.

SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Title: How do I take this photo?
SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Description: Stand close to your meter. You don’t need a photo of the whole meter. Just capture the box containing the value with your camera directly facing it. Ensure the numbers are clear and there is no glare, shadow or distortion.

SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Title: Uploading from your album?
SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Description:
You'll need to submit {0} different meter reading values ({1}).

Be sure to upload straight-facing photos containing the values. You don’t need a photo of the whole meter. Ensure the numbers are clear and there is no glare, shadow or distortion.

SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Title: How do I take these photos?
SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Description: Stand close to your meter. You don’t need a photo of the whole meter. Just capture the box containing the values with your camera directly facing it. Ensure the numbers are clear and there is no glare, shadow or distortion.

SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Title: Uploading from your album?
SMRPhotoPopUpDetails.Description: Be sure to upload straight-facing photos containing the values. You don’t need a photo of the whole meter. Ensure the numbers are clear and there is no glare, shadow or distortion.

Usage.title: Usage
Usage.accountsMissing: Why are some of my accounts not here?
Usage.disconnectionMsg:
What does this mean?

Electricity supply to your premises is currently unavailable. This may be due to a temporary disconnection request by the owner or an overdue bill payment.

If you've made a payment, please give us some time for this to be reflected.
Usage.projectedCostMsg:
My bill amount so far:

Your bill amount so far is the amount you have used up until yesterday.

My bill may reach:

This is calculated based on your average daily consumption for the past one (1) month, your actual bill may differ. To find out more, please visit our FAQ page.

Note: The amount shown is before applicable taxes / additional charges.
Usage.missedReadMsg: Your usage could not be retrieved at the moment. You may refresh to try again.
Usage.emptyDataMsg: Welcome to your usage view! Your usage will be shown here after you receive your first bill.
Usage.SMOverlayTitle: How do I view my daily usage?
Usage.SMOverlayMsg: Pinch to zoom in or out! Zoom in to view your daily breakdown.
Usage.mdmsUnavailableMsg: Your daily usage information is currently unavailable. Check back in a while!
Usage.tutorialSMRTitle: Your reading status at a glance.
Usage.tutorialSMRDesc: Get an overview of your reading status here. We’ll also tell you when it’s time to submit your readings.
Usage.tariffLegendNote: Note: The coloured blocks above represent your electricity rates. For a detailed breakdown, please refer to your bill.

Bills.noHistoryData: Looks like you have no bills yet! Once you do, your bills and payment history will appear here.

AddAccount.addAcctSuccessMsgBody: You may now track your usage, pay your bill and manage your account!
AddAccount.titleownerNoAccDec: We tried looking for any other electricity accounts that belongs to you but we can’t seem to find any.
AddAccount.bodyownerNoAccDec: This could be due to us not having the correct identification number to match with.
AddAccount.bodyUpdateId: Submit the correct identification number now and we'll help find and add your account(s) after the update.
AddAccount.bodyContinue: You can still add the account manually with its account number, but your access to the account will be limited as an unverified owner.
AddAccount.tnc: By confirming, I have read and agreed to the Terms and Conditions.
AddAccount.tnc_checked: I have read and agreed to the Terms and Conditions.
AddAccount.AccHeaderText: Let's add your account by selecting your account type.

AddAccount.ROCHeaderText: Do more on myTNB with your company's ROC number.
AddAccount.ROCDetailsText: Enjoy additional account information and access to applications!
AddAccount.OwnerDetectTitle: We found {0} electricity account that matches your myTNB account.
AddAccount.DiclaimerHeaderTNBTerm: TNB Terms of Use, User Agreement and Privacy policy
AddAccount.DisclaimerDetails1: I confirm that I ({0}) the owner / authorised person, have the consent and permission to view the account information for the account(s) listed. As a non-owner I agree to share my name and email address with the owner upon submission of this request.
AddAccount.DisclaimerDetails2: Please be informed that this application is for the privilege use between TNB and its account holder and any other person with the consent of the account holder. TNB shall not be held liable for any improper use and incorrect use of the information described and contained herein and under no obligation to check the authenticity of such consent and permission given. Upon confirming, you are deemed to have read, understood and agreed to the disclaimer as displayed.

Onboarding.title7: Use myTNB with Any Mobile Number.
Onboarding.description1:
We're excited for all you can do with this app! But first, choose your preferred language.

Pelbagai manfaat dan kemudahan untuk anda nikmati dengan myTNB! Mulakan dengan menetapkan bahasa pilihan anda.
Onboarding.description2: Track, monitor and stay on top of your electricity usage!
Onboarding.description3: Have easy access to the PDF version of your bills for the past 6 months, all in one place!
Onboarding.description4: Pay your electricity bills while at home, on holiday, on the train – whenever you want to. Say goodbye to late charges and queuing up!
Onboarding.description5: That's right, we're bringing you exclusive perks and freebies - all of this just for myTNB users! Check out the new Rewards section to claim something now!
Onboarding.description6:
We’re now bilingual! You can set your preferred language below.

Kami kini dalam dwibahasa! Anda boleh tetapkan bahasa pilihan anda di bawah.
Onboarding.description7: You can now register a myTNB account or update your existing one with an international phone number.

Register.IdBodyError: Please ensure that you’ve entered the correct identification number, or contact TNB CareLine to enquire further about this matter.
Register.emailVerifiedLinkSent: We have sent a verification link to {0}. You may verify it by clicking the link in your email afterwards to unlock all the things that myTNB has to offer!

FeedbackForm.faultyLampMessage: You may only report faulty TNB street lamps. Look out for TNB’s blue and red or the logo as shown above. Use the pole number (e.g. 17493 8E 1) to specify the lamp.

SubmitEnquiry.submitEnquiryDescription: Let us know your thoughts and concerns.

SubmitEnquiry.thankYouDescription: We’ll get back to you soon. In the meantime, stay updated by tracking your enquiry status.
SubmitEnquiry.registeredTitle: Is this electricity account registered under your name?
SubmitEnquiry.registeredInfoDetail: A registered owner is the person who opened this electricity account under their name with their IC or Passport.

SubmitEnquiry.updateOwnerTitle: Which information would you like to update on your owner's behalf?
SubmitEnquiry.ownerConsentInfo: Do I need account owner’s consent?
SubmitEnquiry.ownerConsentDescription: You as a non-owner or an authorised person are required to provide the owner’s proof of consent to update the personal details on their behalf as it will permanently update the owner’s TNB electricity account details.
SubmitEnquiry.icInfo: How does copy of identification look like?
SubmitEnquiry.consentInfo: How does proof of consent look like?
SubmitEnquiry.poc: Accepted proof of consents can be in the form of emails, SMS, conversation screenshots or letters stating the consent being given to you.
SubmitEnquiry.copyIcDet: You’ll need a scanned copy of myKad (front and back), Passport or Army/Police ID with ‘For TNB purposes only’ written across the image.
SubmitEnquiry.ownerConsentTitle: Do I need account owner’s consent?
SubmitEnquiry.plsEnterAcc: Please enter or select your electricity account number first.

SubmitEnquiry.enquiryTnc: By submitting, I have read and agreed to the Terms and Conditions

SubmitEnquiry.enquiryTncRead: I have read and agreed to the Terms and Conditions
SubmitEnquiry.permisesTooltipTitle: How does supporting document look like?
SubmitEnquiry.permisesTitle: Copy of Sales & Purchase Agreement/Cukai Pintu/Tenancy Agreement
SubmitEnquiry.permisesContent: We only need the pages with your name, identification number and premises address
SubmitEnquiry.submitEnquiryEmpty: Looks like you have no submitted enquiry at the moment.
SubmitEnquiry.tncAgreeOwner:
Undertaking by the Registered Account Owner

1. I hereby confirm that I, {0} and email ({1}), the registered account holder for the electricity supply {2},  and I have the right to correct and/or update the account information for this account.

2. I hereby certify that the information given in this request and any document(s) submitted are true and accurate.

3. I understand that:

a. it will be necessary for TNB to verify my identity;

b. TNB may contact me for more detailed information regarding this request; and

c. all personal data provided by me in this form will be collected and processed by TNB as personal data in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act 2010.

4.  I hereby agreed to indemnify TNB for any losses, costs and expenses incurred by TNB in connection with this request or in the event that any information and/or document(s) submitted by me is/are not true.

Please be informed that this application is for the privilege use between TNB and its registered account holder and any relevant person with the consent of the registered account holder. TNB shall not be held liable for any improper use and incorrect use of the information described and contained herein and under no obligation to check the authenticity of such consent and permission given. Upon clicking the submit button, you have deemed to read, understood and agreed to the undertaking as displayed
SubmitEnquiry.tncAgreeNonOwner:
Undertaking by the Relevant Person (any person who has been authorized to update personal data on behalf of the account owner)

1. I hereby confirm that I, {0} and email ({1}) , have been authorized by the registered account holder for the electricity supply {2} to correct and/or update the account information for this account.

2. I hereby undertake that consent of the registered account holder has been obtained accordingly for this request and the proof of authorization is attached together with this request.

3. I hereby certify that the information given in request and any document(s) submitted are true and accurate.

4. I understand that:

a. it will be necessary for TNB to verify my identity;

b. TNB may contact me for more detailed information regarding this request; and

c. all personal data provided by me in this form will be collected and processed by TNB as personal data in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act 2010.

5. I hereby agreed to indemnify TNB for any losses, costs and expenses incurred by TNB in connection with this request or in the event that any information and/or document(s) submitted by me is/are not true.

Please be informed that this application is for the privilege use between TNB and its registered account holder and any relevant person with the consent of the registered account holder. TNB shall not be held liable for any improper use and incorrect use of the information described and contained herein and under no obligation to check the authenticity of such consent and permission given. Upon clicking the submit button, you have deemed to read, understood and agreed to the undertaking as displayed
